# Prompt: Create Landing Section (Nuxt UI)

Create a new landing page section component for this project.

Constraints:
- Nuxt 4 + TypeScript
- Use Nuxt UI v4 components first
- Keep the component presentational (no direct API/DB access)
- Props-driven, reusable, accessible

Output:
- Component file path under `components/landing/`
- Any minimal supporting types under `types/`
- Update the home page to render the section
